info.name: Midnight Marauder
info.description: A very groovy Dark Purple themed style for YouTube with cool gimmicks!
info.additionalInfo:
Please note to those who install 

The theme is not completely finished although it's mostly done but please if you find anything that needs changing or what i can add feel free to tell me!
